system_prompt: You are a technical evaluator. Be concise and rubric-based.
rubric: Score (1-5) on Problem Solving, Python, APIs/HTTP, Databases/SQL, Communication. Justify briefly. Finish with Overall Verdict: Hire/No Hire.
jd: Backend Python role. Flask/FastAPI, Postgres, REST, testing.
full_transcript:
Interviewer: Tell me about a REST API you built.
Candidate: I designed endpoints with FastAPI, used pydantic models, and added pagination and auth with JWT...
